title: Let’s set up your General Ledger Accounts
subtitle: Choose how you’d like to create your chart of accounts. You can edit or expand it later.

header.categoriesInfo: Categories: 1 = Operating revenue · 2 = Non-operating revenue · 3 = Operating expense · 4 = Non-operating expense.

csv.title: Upload via CSV or Excel
csv.hintHeaderRow: The file must include a header row
csv.hintColumns: Required columns (in this exact order): CATEGORY, SUBGROUP, ACCOUNT.
csv.hintXlsxMeta: For .xlsx, use the official template. The file is validated using an internal meta sheet and template ID.

manual.title: Enter manually
manual.instructions: Use the format CATEGORY;SUBGROUP;ACCOUNT — one per line. CATEGORY must be 1, 2, 3, or 4.
manual.placeholder:
Examples:
1; Sales; Product sales
3; Administrative; Salaries and wages
4; Financial; Bank fees

standard.title: Use a Standard Plan
standard.hint: We will create a suggested chart of accounts using the four categories. You can edit or delete them later.

snackbar.selectCsv: Please select a CSV or XLSX file.
snackbar.standardRequired: Choose a standard plan (Personal or Business).
snackbar.standardSuccess: Standard plan applied to your accounts.
snackbar.chooseMode: Pick one option (CSV/Excel, Manual, or Standard Plan).

misc.groupMappingNote: Categories are sent as numbers (1..4) to the API.
